ML MoleTest

To make a prediction, take or upload a file using the File button. Then click run.

This system works by running the image through a Convoultional Neural Network trained to recognise the differences between Benign and Malignant moles. To learn more about how this works go to the info page. The model may take a while to run depending on your computer graphics system, so be patient.

This is a development version! The results are not accurate. This is for bug testing and beta testing.
